results.title: A Postcard from Ovens
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Jack Keane
results.brief_description: An edited excerpt from ‘Working Holiday’ (1957) produced by Jack Keane for the Victorian Department of Agriculture. Shows hop picking in Victoria where seasonal workers gather from all parts of Australia for six weeks to harvest hops in the rich Ovens Valley. The weekend breaks are spent swimming, fishing or sight-seeing in the surrounding Alps.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Jack Keane

The weekend breaks are spent swimming, fishing or sight-seeing in the surrounding Alps.

results.title: A Postcard from Mt Buffalo
results.brief_description:
An edited excerpt from “Alpine Playground ” (1962)
produced by Cinesound/Tourist Development Authority of Victoria. The original full length title is held on 16mm in the ACMI collection.

results.title: A Positive approach to the psychiatric patient
results.brief_description: Shows the treatment in Veterans Administration hospital for psychiatric patients who have emerged from acute episodes of mental illness but who are not yet well enough to leave the hospital. Uses a hospital ward unit as the focal setting, and stresses the roles of the nurse aide and physician.
results.title_for_label: A Positive approach to the psychiatric patient

Uses a hospital ward unit as the focal setting, and stresses the roles of the nurse aide and physician.

results.title: A Positive Approach
results.brief_description: People who are coming to terms with being HIV positive or who have AIDS have to face a number of issues at a time when they may be feeling disoriented and vulnerable. This video is aimed at both volunteers and professionals such as social and health workers, volunteer support groups, counsellors, nurses, doctors and prison officers who offer help and support. The program is in four sections: The needs of the person with AIDS; self preparation of the carer/ counsellor; counselling skills; support for the carer/counsellor.
